Reviews.Title: Major problems
Reviews.Author: W. Perry "stonetop"
Reviews.Content: When this camera arrived at my mail box, it was installed after a review of it's installation manual.  When it was removed from it shipping box, something in side the camera is loose (something rattling around inside the camera).  I install it anyway in hope that it would work. This is a replacement of a old camera.  After installation the images on the viewer is blurred.  The camera was left in place to see if it would clear up latter, instead that night more problems appeared, The night vision is the color blue.  Never seen anything like this before and that is a deal breaker.This camera my be a very good one but the one I got is not something that I won't among the other 15 camera on the DVR.  HOPE YOU HAVE BETTER LUCK WITH YOUR.
